featured.text: He took an aspirin, iced the injured area, and off he went.

definition.zh_def: 阿斯匹靈，一種常用的非類固醇抗炎藥，主要用於減輕疼痛、降低發燒和抗炎。
definition.en_def: Aspirin is a commonly used nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that helps relieve pain, reduce fever, and decrease inflammation.
definition.example: I took an aspirin to relieve my headache.
